website_summaries.verdict: Buyers who plan to take full advantage of the Toshiba Satellite Radius 12's excellent 4K screen might get their money's worth. If you want a computer for getting work done, look elsewhere.
pros: The small and light Toshiba Satellite Radius 12 is packed with features, including a Core i7 CPU, a face-recognizing camera and a 4K touchscreen display that bends over backward into a tablet configuration
cons: You won't make it through a day with the Radius 12's sub-par battery life
The keyboard is a little difficult to type on and the touchpad can be downright frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Sweet 2-IN-1 for a sweet price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Like other positive reviews here. This came in flawless and the trackpad works like a dream! I had one of these brand new from a different website and that one had not only a bad trackpad, but it also had problems with the screen. In dark scenes on any video it was pixelated and there were artifacts. I watch the same videos with this and they play perfectly. There's not one thing lacking from this laptop as far as features and specs are concerned. For this price, its's a steal. Although, it did jump up $20 since I bought. I got it for $599. Give it a shot!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Izard

customer_reviews.title: Some issues, but nice
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed in that I did not get the rush I requested, but the seller refunded the extra funds promptly after notification of the failure. I have been using it for about two weeks now and it seems to have started showing signs of the mouse freeze issues. Reading suggests that this is an issue with a grounding wire that can big fixed. I am going to try and contact the vendor for assistance on this if it can be fixed will update the rating to a 4. Not sure yet if it does deserve 5 but it could seems like a nice machine and it is very portable and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The touch pads grounding wire had a bad solder joint
customer_reviews.text: This computer is absolutely stunning!! Of course i geeked out and scanned Amazon ratings, reviews and YouTube videos to narrow down the potential candidates for my new laptop. Very little exposure on this device which had me concerned at first. Until, there was a unanimous word of caution that i kept seeing in tech support forums. The touch pads grounding wire had a bad solder joint. The original owners that paid full price ran into this defect and returned the laptop and was eventually repaired and resold as refurbished. What does this means for me and you?? A beautiful and flawless laptop for half the price! this machine exceeded my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Good light Ultrabook/Convertible for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good light Ultrabook/Convertible for the money. 4K UHD display is sharp and colorful (thanks to sRGB and REC.709 profiles). Solid performance (thanks to Intel i7) and 8GB of RAM. SSD performance is also acceptable. Unit arrived with a half finished restore. I am very experienced and restore unit myself. I won't know the product because of the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Species8472XGN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's ok; I got a refurbished unit but the Manu. the website says its for export. This a knock on the the prod but make sure you get a 4k laptop because that websites aren't optimized for it. This laptop is fast from to turn on BLAZING fast. It gets very hot and battery is ok you will have to plug it in frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this several yrs ago. Best laptop I have owned. Would definitely buy another no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: DOA and trackpad is terrible
customer_reviews.text: When it first arrived, the battery was non-functional. The laptop would only work while plugged in. Toshiba made me pay to ship it for a warranty repair. When I got it back, the trackpad would stop working for a couple seconds every few minutes. I tried various suggested fixes online (short of using a soldering iron) before giving up and returning the whole laptop. What a huge annoyance
customer_reviews.author: Byron Igoe

customer_reviews.title: Good, versatile product with a minor issue.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for five months, and the only issue it has given me has been a spotty mouse-pad that acts up from time to time. I've been able to use a wireless mouse when this comes up without issue. Beyond that, it is incredibly fast, quiet, lightweight and versatile. It definitely packs a punch for the type of use I give it (research, programming and general day-to-day internet use). I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: The touch pad will fail.
customer_reviews.text: It's everything it says it is, but the touch pad will fail as many of the reviews attest. Make sure you order a USB mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Ironman

customer_reviews.title: The return process like other companies is not very fast
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba shipped this with a faulty power supply so i had to buy a $15 for no brand prelacement. The return process like other companies is not very fast. Otherwise it is an awesome laptop that runs well and fits my needs perfectly. Also as a side note the build quality is fairly cheap so do not buy it for clumsy people or children. if you have ever cracked a smartphone screen i would be wary of buying this since they used cheaper build materials to keep the price low. I got it for the 4k screen and the 4-8 hour battery life with a convertible option and these 3 features i am happy with the most.
customer_reviews.author: chad hamby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the price. Fantastic picture with the 4k, fast processor and overall no major complains.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Presswood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I found no errors and no scratches on it. Plus it works really well!
customer_reviews.author: Yohan Chang

customer_reviews.title: noisy with no reason
customer_reviews.text: I knew that this device has some problems even before I bought it. I just repaired the touchpad with couple of centimeters thin cable. However I have absolutely no idea about where this annoying noise come from.
customer_reviews.author: Karakas

customer_reviews.title: flawed hardware
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the hardware felt great and had nice feel. picture looked great. didnt get to keep the unit because the very first windows boot up said there was a malfunction in the cooling system and to turn off and return device immediately. im usually weary of refurbished units from non manufacturer companies but figured i would give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 Not Activated, nor Setup Correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Issaquah Highlands Tech. Item came without Windows 10 being preconfigured. I can only enter the Administrator account. System Preparation Tool 3.14 appears when logging in, but since no product key came with the device, I cannot safely make use of it. Not only that, but Windows is not activated, since no product key was ever entered by the refurbisher.
customer_reviews.author: Ankle Spanker

customer_reviews.title: it's a great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has touchpad issue. Search in Google. I am using external mouse. Other than that, it's a great laptop.
customer_reviews.author: AY

customer_reviews.title: This is a great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great computer for the price. There are 3 issues thought #1 The screen is incredibly reflective to the point of making it challenging to see the screen. I have ordered a non relective screen cover to see if i can mitigate this problem.\ #2 The Keyboard is small. They Tab key as well as the shift key has been cut down. #3 There is a USB C port on this computer but it is not used for charging. They use a propitiatory round charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bright

customer_reviews.title: Horrible internet connection
customer_reviews.text: The wifi on this computer is DISGUSTINGLY slow. After some research is seems to be a common problem associated with the network card. DO NOT buy this computer unless you're planning to be offline. My desktop, old laptop, and tablet all run at fast speeds while this laptop cannot even load a 144p video. Completely unusable for modern computer usage.
customer_reviews.author: Keylimepie
